sentence.Network_en: At that time most people believed in sorcery and witchcraft.
sentence.Network_cn: 那时候大多数人相信巫术和魔法.

sentence.Network_en: The dancing flames of an aurora will add a touch of sorcery to the scene.
sentence.Network_cn: 闪烁的极光会给这片景色增添一层神秘色彩.

sentence.Network_en: This is due to their direct lineage from primitive sorcery dance.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是由于它直接来自原始巫舞之故.

list.abs: as a mask , face which has different functions of form and language . in primitive society , face bear weight of religion sense and sorcery sense .作为面具的脸的形态语言功能是多样的，在原始社会它承载着宗教意识、巫术意识。

entry.def: Sorcery is magic performed by using the power of evil spirits.

means.word_mean: 1. the belief in magical spells that harness occult forces or evil spirits to produce unnatural effects in the world
